subject: Public Speaking
title: JFK: Inspiration and Idealism
description: A micro-lesson that makes JFK: Inspiration and Idealism usable.

hook.text: Ask not what your country can do for you. Ask what you can do.

buildup.text: JFK invited Americans into shared purpose and national pride.

discovery.text: He used antithesis to flip perspective. Opposition creates meaning.

twist.text: Youthful energy made idealism feel achievable, not naive.

climax.text: Political rhetoric can be poetic without losing power.
